In this report, we describe the genomic, structural, medical, and literature evidence, which, when
considered together, strongly contradicts the natural origin theory. The evidence shows that SARS-CoV-
2 should be a laboratory product created by using bat coronaviruses ZC45 and/or ZXC21 as a template
and/or backbone. Building upon the evidence, we further postulate a synthetic route for SARS-CoV-2,
demonstrating that the laboratory-creation of this coronavirus is convenient and can be accomplished in
approximately six months. Our work emphasizes the need for an independent investigation into the
relevant research laboratories. It also argues for a critical look into certain recently published data, which,
albeit problematic, was used to support and claim a natural origin of SARS-CoV-2. From a public health
perspective, these actions are necessary as knowledge of the origin of SARS-CoV-2 and of how the virus
entered the human population are of pivotal importance in the fundamental control of the COVID-19
pandemic as well as in preventing similar, future pandemics.

研究同比較武肺同幾隻同蝙蝠有關既冠狀病毒d 基因組，蛋白質排序個d野，大致上係講有d對病毒係人體入面生長或者突變能力重要既蛋白質，係武肺同其中一d virus 係高程度咁吻合，而呢個程度正常黎講係極不可能自然出現變成武肺。加上基因組排序亦係好相似，幾個因素加埋一齊令作者極度懷疑武肺係由實驗室以一種已知既冠狀病毒為藍圖/中心，人工改造而成。

呢啲係咪要publish 去journal先有認受性？
利申：唔係呢行

replies.msg: 要peer view 個d 做晒先會肯登

https://www.thestandnews.com/society/%E6%AD%A6%E6%BC%A2%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E-%E9%80%83%E4%BA%A1%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E5%89%8D%E6%B8%AF%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E8%80%85%E9%96%BB%E9%BA%97%E5%A4%A2%E7%99%BC%E8%A1%A8%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E8%AB%96%E6%96%87-%E6%8C%87%E6%8E%A7%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%BA%90%E8%87%AA%E5%AF%A6%E9%A9%97%E5%AE%A4/

武漢肺炎源頭至今仍然成謎。港大公共衞生學院前研究員、現已逃亡美國的中國病毒學家閻麗夢（Li Meng Yan）曾指控中共製造病毒、隱瞞疫情，她今日（19日）終於發表其研究報告。報告指控武漢肺炎病毒是實驗室產品，並認為實驗室可以花約 6 個月的時間輕易製造病毒。報告要求就相關的實驗室展開獨立調查。

閻麗夢的研究報告題目指出，武漢肺炎病毒 SARS-CoV-2 基因組的不尋常特徵，顯示來自複雜的實驗室改造，而非自然進化而成。

研究指雖然外界廣泛接受病毒自然起源的理論，但缺乏實質性支持。相反一些指出病毒可能來自實驗室的理論，則在同行評審的科學期刊上遭嚴格審查，然而 SARS-CoV-2 的生物學特性與自然產生的病毒並不一致。

研究報告出，病毒的基因組和結構、醫學及文獻證據都與病毒自然起源的理論相違背，稱有證據顯示 SARS-CoV-2是使用了蝙蝠冠狀病毒作骨架的實驗室產品。研究提出武漢肺炎病毒的合成路線，表明實驗室可以輕易地在大約 6 個月內製造病毒。

指病毒基因排序 與重慶實驗室發現的蝙蝠冠狀病毒相似

閻麗夢的研究指出 SARS-CoV-2 基因組排序可疑地與由中國重慶第三軍醫大學軍事實驗室與南京司令部醫學研究所發現的蝙蝠冠狀病毒相似。SARS-Cov-2 刺突蛋白中，決定病毒宿主特異性的受體結合基序（receptor-binding motif, RBM），可疑地類似 2003 年流行的 SARS-CoV ，而基因組證據表明， RBM 已被基因操縱。

SARS-CoV-2 在其刺突蛋白中包含一個獨特的 Furin 蛋白酶切位點，論文形容「眾所周知該切位點可增強病毒感染性和細胞嗜性」。然而切位點完全不存在於自然界中發現的同類冠狀病毒。此外與此相關的稀有密碼子（codon）顯示該 Furin 蛋白酶切位點不屬自然演化，可以通過人工插入 SARS-CoV-2 基因組中。論文結尾亦補充，團隊會在短期內發後續報告，提供更多額外數據證明 SARS-CoV-2 是實驗室合成病毒。

閻麗夢為病毒學家，於中國南方醫科大學獲取博士學位，之後於港大擔任研究員。今年 4 月，她搭乘班機抵達美國。她在今年 7 月接受《Fox News》專訪，指控中國政府早就得悉病毒存在。她又指控其上司、港大醫學院公共衞生學院教授潘烈文無視其研究，甚至警告她「勿碰紅線」。她在受訪時說自己己經預料將再不能回家，更指若自己被中方捉到，可能會「被失蹤」。

港大當時回應指，閻麗夢曾在港大任職博士後研究員，現已離職，其個人意見和看法均不代表港大。港大指有關報道內容與港大理解的關鍵事實並不相符，閻麗夢在 2019 年 12 月至 2020 年 1 月期間，從未在港大進行她在訪問中重點提及的有關新冠病毒人傳人的研究，又指她在訪問中的重點表述雷同傳言，並沒有科學支持。

Unusual Features of the SARS-CoV-2 Genome Suggesting Sophisticated Laboratory Modification Rather Than Natural Evolution and Delineation of Its Probable Synthetic Route
Yan, Li-Meng; Kang, Shu; Guan, Jie; Hu, Shanchang

The COVID-19 pandemic caused by the novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 has led to over 910,000 deaths worldwide and unprecedented decimation of the global economy. Despite its tremendous impact, the origin of SARS-CoV-2 has remained mysterious and controversial. The natural origin theory, although widely accepted, lacks substantial support. The alternative theory that the virus may have come from a research laboratory is, however, strictly censored on peer-reviewed scientific journals. Nonetheless, SARS-CoV-2 shows biological characteristics that are inconsistent with a naturally occurring, zoonotic virus. In this report, we describe the genomic, structural, medical, and literature evidence, which, when considered together, strongly contradicts the natural origin theory. The evidence shows that SARS-CoV-2 should be a laboratory product created by using bat coronaviruses ZC45 and/or ZXC21 as a template and/or backbone. Building upon the evidence, we further postulate a synthetic route for SARS-CoV-2, demonstrating that the laboratory-creation of this coronavirus is convenient and can be accomplished in approximately six months. Our work emphasizes the need for an independent investigation into the relevant research laboratories. It also argues for a critical look into certain recently published data, which, albeit problematic, was used to support and claim a natural origin of SARS-CoV-2. From a public health perspective, these actions are necessary as knowledge of the origin of SARS-CoV-2 and of how the virus entered the human population are of pivotal importance in the fundamental control of the COVID-19 pandemic as well as in preventing similar, future pandemics.
